    Create a time series based on the data document features and labels.
    boolean
    RedisTimeseries.createRule(String aSrcKeyName, String aDstKeyName, Redis.Function aFunction, long aBucketSize)
    Creates a compaction rule for the time series.
    long
    RedisTimeseries.delete(String aKeyName)
    Deletes the key and associated value synchronously from the Redis database.
    boolean
    RedisTimeseries.deleteRule(String aSrcKeyName, String aDstKeyName)
    Deletes a compaction rule for the time series.
    com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid
    RedisTimeseries.queryKeys(com.redis.foundation.ds.DSCriteria aDSCriteria)
    Queries a Redis time series using a label criteria and returns a data grid containing rows of matching keys.

    RedisTimeseries.queryRange(com.redis.foundation.ds.DSCriteria aDSCriteria)
    Queries a Redis time series using a timestamp range and label criteria and returns a data grid containing rows of matching samples.

    RedisTimeseries.update(com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDataDoc)
